## TileLoader.updatePriority() method

Update the priority of this \[\[Tile\]\]'s priority. Is effective to sort the decoding requests in the request queue (used during heavy load).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updatePriority(priority: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  priority | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
